name: Hongshaliang Surface Coal Mine
company_mentions: 窑街煤电集团酒泉天宝煤业有限公司

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/%E7%AA%92%E8%A1%97%E7%85%A4%E7%94%B5%E9%9B%86%E5%9B%A2%E9%85%92%E6%B3%89%E5%A4%A9%E5%AE%9D%E7%85%A4%E4%B8%9A%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8%E7%BA%A2%E6%B2%99%E6%A2%81%E9%9C%B2%E5%A4%A9%E7%9F%BF. The Hongshaliang Surface Coal Mine is an open-pit coal mine located in the Su Bei Mongolian Autonomous County of Jiuquan City, Gansu Province

operators: 窑街煤电集团酒泉天宝煤业有限公司
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by the Jiuquan Tianbao Coal Industry Co., Ltd., which is part of the Yaojie Coal and Electricity Group.
